requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720M or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
